javaxipc30
Class SidList

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javaxipc30.SidList
public final class SidList
extends java.lang.Object

A SidList represents a list of SemSys semaphore id's. SidLists are required for many SemSys operations. The methods of this class are alternatives, with a more object oriented flavor, to the Xipc.SemListBuild() and Xipc.SemListAdd() methods.

See Also:
Xipc.SemListBuild(int), Xipc.SemListAdd(javaxipc30.SidList, int)

public final SidList SemListAdd(int Sid)
Adds a semaphore id to a SidList.

Parameters:

Returns:
